title: Twelve South refreshes SurfacePad iPhone 13 leather folio case with two new spring colors
content:
Today, Twelve South is refreshing one of the more unique offerings in its lineup. Perfect for spring, two new styles of the SurfacePad folio case have arrived to coat your iPhone 13 series device in a signature Twelve South leather form-factor. 

more…

The post Twelve South refreshes SurfacePad iPhone 13 leather folio case with two new spring colors  appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Twelve South SurfacePad iPhone 13 cases have been refreshed for spring with two new colors of the popular leather wallet folio.
